backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, authorization checks, and request data structures with create/retrieve functions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short summaries of many frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and CSS variable definitions for light/dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/README.md: Frontend README with basic project and development instructions.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React router setup with layout, theme provider, and all page routes including protected ones.
frontend/src/components/admin/AnalyticsC: Displays admin analytics stats using cards with icons and values.
frontend/src/components/animation/Floati: Renders animated floating background shapes for visual effects.
frontend/src/components/animation/Reveal: IntersectionObserver-based wrapper that fades content in on scroll.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Access denied UI with explanation and button to return home.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatPanel.t: Chat interface for request conversations with message list, send box, and read status handling.
Input wrapper restricting allowed input types to safe text-like fields.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout component providing navigation, theming toggle, and role-based links around page content.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Typing: Animated typing text component cycling through a marketing tagline.
frontend/src/components/ratings/RatingDi: Dialog for submitting a star rating and comment for a helper, using a rating mutation.
frontend/src/components/requests/Request: Filter panel for searching and narrowing requests by text, offline-only toggle, and city.
Grid of request cards showing status, location, chat info, and optional action buttons.
Success banner showing confirmation after submitting a request with actions to navigate or submit another.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Admin-focused hooks for fetching users, requests, analytics, and performing delete operations via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Authentication hook that exposes identity, profile, role helpers, login/logout, and dashboard navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching, sending, and marking chat messages as read, plus querying unread counts.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Contains hooks for loading and saving the caller's user profile via the actor API with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider handling authentication, identity loading, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useRatings.ts: Offers hooks to add ratings and fetch ratings for the current helper or a specific user.
frontend/src/hooks/useRequests.ts: Provides hooks for creating, fetching, updating, and filtering task requests through the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom theme variables for light/dark mode, gradients, glass effects, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, wrapping it in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CreateAccountPage.tsx: Implements the account creation flow with login, profile form handling, profile saving, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Admin dashboard for viewing analytics and managing users and requests, including deletion actions.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/HelperDash: Displays helper dashboard with filters, available/assigned requests, accept/complete actions, and chat panel integration.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/StudentDas: Shows student dashboard with request filtering, status grouping, chat access, and rating dialog for completed tasks.
frontend/src/pages/FreelancingHelpPage.t: Provides a form for users to submit freelancing help requests and shows a success banner after submission.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the platform landing page with hero content, feature highlights, stats, and navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles user login via Internet Identity and redirects authenticated users to their dashboards.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Displays a 404 message with an option to return to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/StudentRequestHelpPag: Allows students to submit help requests, including optional offline location details, and shows a success banner afterward.
frontend/src/routes/ProtectedRoute.tsx: Guards routes by checking authentication, profile readiness, and optional role requirements.
frontend/src/seo/usePageTitle.ts: Hook that sets the document title with an EduBridge suffix.
frontend/src/utils/localProfileExtras.ts: Utilities to store, retrieve, and clear extra profile fields in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from URL/hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings for the app's theme.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the appâ€™s purpose, architecture, features, and current version.
